name: Xulong Tang
content: Xulong Tang Xulong Tang Xulong Tang Welcome! I am an associate professor in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Pittsburgh. My research spans computer architecture and systems, with a focus on multi-GPU architectures, high-performance LLM infrastructure and systems, edge AI, and quantum systems. I received my Ph.D. from Penn State and Master from USTC. Contact: 210 S. Bouquet Street, SENSQ 6115. Department of Computer Science, University of Pittsburgh, Pittsburgh, PA, 15213 Email: tax6 AT pitt DOT edu Curriculum Vitae Google Scholar DBLP LinkedIn Home Research Publications Talks Teaching Services I am looking for two self-motivated and talented students to join my research group in 2026 Fall. If you are interested, please send me a brief email with your CV. Activities Pinned. Serving ASPLOS 2026 General Co-Chairs with Dr.Vijaykrishnan Narayanan from Penn State. 05/2025. Promoted to Associate Professor with Tenure from Sep 1st 2025 :-) 06/2025. One paper accepted ICCAD 2025. 05/2025. One paper accepted ICML 2025. 04/2025. Congrats to Bingyao Li, who will join CSE@UCRiverside as a Tenure-Track Assistant Professor! 04/2025. Congrats to Yue Dai, who will join CS@IIT as a Tenure-Track Assistant Professor!
